resources.string: To use the Level, put your device on the surface you wish to level and tap the screen. The white ball in the center of the screen will move depending on if the surface is level or not. If it is not level, the ball will move in the direction of the decline of the surface. The measurement will restart once the ball hits any of the walls. However, if you would like to restart the measurement before the ball hits a wall you may tap the screen to restart.
